txt_en: Laughter is the spark that turns ordinary days into childhood magic.
txt_cn: 嘴角扬起的弧度，是童年最灵验的魔法。

txt_en: You don't have to be perfect to be worthy of love.
txt_cn: 你无需完美，依然值得被爱。

txt_en: Bravery is choosing to speak your truth even when your voice shakes.
txt_cn: 真正的勇敢，是颤抖着也要说出心底的光。

txt_en: The smallest act of kindness can rewrite someone's story.
txt_cn: 点滴温暖，可成他人生命中的燎原星火。

txt_en: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
txt_cn: 再微小的善意，亦是星火燎原。

txt_en: Scars are not signs of brokenness, but proof of how we mended.
txt_cn: 伤疤不是破碎的印记，而是愈合的勋章。

txt_en: Even the tiniest pebble can ripple an entire ocean.
The world needs all kinds of minds to stitch its tapestry.
txt_cn: 世界需要不同的灵魂，织就它的瑰丽画卷。

txt_en: A friend's handprint on your heart never fades, even when they're gone.
txt_cn: 挚友在心上留下的掌纹，纵使离别亦永不褪色。

txt_en: Plant your dreams in cracked soil—that's where roots dig deepest.
txt_cn: 绝境中的希望，往往迸发最顽强的生命力。

txt_en: Never dull your sparkle to fit into someone else's sky.
txt_cn: 莫因他人眼中的天空，遮掩自身的光芒。

txt_en: Even the faintest glow can lead you home when the world feels too dark.
txt_cn: 暗夜中的萤火，胜过白昼的骄阳。

txt_en: You have something none of us have.
txt_cn: 你有他人所不具备的特质。

txt_en: Turn your scars into compasses—they'll point you to where light waits.
txt_cn: 伤疤是灵魂的地图，标记光来的方向。

txt_en: A song stitched with tears can still mend a thousand broken nights.
txt_cn: 歌声是暗夜的针线，将心事缝成星辰。

txt_en: Strength isn't always a roar; sometimes it's the breath you hold to keep going.
txt_cn: 沉默中的坚韧，震耳欲聋。
